shortDescription: Led the creative direction and styling of a branded photoshoot for Lela Boutique. Delivered concept development, look styling, shot planning, and project management, crafting a visual narrative that elevated brand identity.
Created persuasive, high-impact copy for digital campaigns, brand messaging, product positioning, and social content. Specialized in tone creation and culturally nuanced voice systems.
Planned and managed paid advertising strategies across digital channels, optimizing budget allocation and performance outcomes with creative testing and analytics.
Developed marketing strategy frameworks for early-stage brands, advising on positioning, organic growth, audience strategy, and launch planning.

Handled creative direction for JoyntPay, developing brand identity, visual language, and tone of voice. Led copywriting for audience messaging, created digital assets for campaigns, and produced audio-visual ads to support digital marketing execution.

Launched Alba Rari as a music project, overseeing full creative direction, songwriting, production, and visual identity. Released debut album ITCH, handling branding, marketing assets, and campaign strategy end-to-end.

Produced original tracks with a genre-fluid sound, providing production for releases and agency-aligned commercial projects including sync and campaign scoring. Created tailored music compositions for visual content and campaigns, focusing on emotional tone, narrative fit, and brand sound identity.
